result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ga: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.orig: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.html: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart dó ḃeiṫ sa ḃaile in áit ḃeiṫ ag ól i dtiṫe táḃairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ga: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.orig: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.html: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir dó ḃeiṫ sa ḃaile in áit ḃeiṫ ag ól i dtiṫe táḃairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: We have to drink to your health.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid do shláinte a ól
result.orig: Caithfidh muid do shláinte a ól
result.html: Caithfidh muid do shláinte a ólWe have to drink to your health.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid do ẛláinte a ólWe have to drink to your health.

result.eng: He raised his glass to drink to health.
result.ga: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ól
result.orig: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ól
result.html: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ólHe raised his glass to drink to health.
result.ponchtml: D'ardaiġ sé a ġloine ċun sláinte a ólHe raised his glass to drink to health.

result.eng: He stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ga: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.orig: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.html: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé ón ól b'in é an príoṁrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.

result.ga: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaí
result.orig: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaí
result.html: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaíYour friends are drinking pints.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḃur gcairde ag ól piontaíYour friends are drinking pints.

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.orig: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.html: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól achNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ponchtml: Ċan díṫ nár ṁaiṫ liom ḃur sláinte a ól aċNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...

result.eng: It's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ga: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.orig: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.html: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú airIt's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ponchtml: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár ṫúsaiġ tú airIt's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
